value:
Please confirm or decline your attendance by clicking the button below. 
If you have any questions, please use the confirmation form to submit them - do not respond to this email.

This is an automated message from the Deal or No Deal production team.
If you have questions, please use the confirmation form to submit them.

We enjoyed meeting you at our auditions and would love to invite you along to a recording of Deal or No Deal. This invitation does not guarantee a place on the podium, but we wish you the very best of luck and sincerely hope you win some big money!

We will be recording multiple episodes on the day. The recording of these shows will take approximately 10 hours. Please be prepared to make yourself available for the full length of time.

You will receive another email closer to your record date with additional paperwork.

Kind regards,
The Deal or No Deal Casting Team
You are invited to a Recording!
